Future climate change scenarios.description: A learning zone on what future climate change scenarios are, and how to use them during decision making.

Understanding the range of potential cli.description: A learning zone to understand future climate projections from climate models.

Navigating the ClimateData.ca climate da.description: A learning zone to understand the ClimateData.ca information and data portal.

The Government of Canada Climate-Resilie.description: A major infrastructure climate resilience-related federal program.

The Government of Canada Climate Lens pr.description: Federal guidelines on considering climate risks as part of obtaining federal infrastructure grants.

The Federation of Canadian Municipalitie.description: Guidance on considering climate risks during municipal decision making.
